name: cursor.studio
description: Website for Cursor web development studio

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run js && npm run copy && npm run css
scripts.copy: npm run copy:img && npm run copy:html
scripts.css:watch: npm run css && node-sass src/scss/style.scss -wo dist/css/ --output-style compressed
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd dist/; scp -r . dallin:/webapps/cursor.studio

author: Dallin Skinner (Cursor)
